name: Necrophobia
desc: The dullahan wizard's magical influence seeps into your thoughts.
apply_message: You feel a dreadful visage of death looming over you...

name: Internal Bleeding
desc: You got hit so hard your organs are bleeding.
apply_message: You begin to feel cold and your body slows...

name: Creeping Cold

miss_messages: The cold makes it hard to strike.

desc: Penguin sorcerer is sliding on its belly!

name: Leech Drain
desc: Your stamina drains and you feel tired!

name: Fear
desc: Your whole body just won't stop shaking.

special_attacks.description: The acid-support zombie launches a hail of corrosive darts!

name: Grove Bomb
description: A fast moving projectile filled with natural energy.

name: Abyss Bomb
description: A fast moving projectile filled with abyssal magic.

name: Toad Bomb
description: A magical toad summoned by the toad shaman.

name: Abyssal Wormling
description: A tiny summoned construct made by a powerful wizard.

special_attacks.monster_message: The leech spire heals a nearby ally!

name: Bourreau Marionette (Stringless)
description: A haunting construct with it's guillotine arms suspended in the air by magical transluscent threads, made to look as if it were flying

name: Bourreau Marionette (Stringed)
description: A haunting construct with it's guillotine arms suspended in the air by magical transluscent threads, made to look as if it were flying

special_attacks.monster_message: Worms emerge from the ground!

name: Cursed Soul Altar
description: A derelict soul altar left by devils or perhaps their worshippers.

name: Crystalline Soul Pod
description: A small sprouting of crystallized soul energy.
Call forth blazing infernos from the flame god to assist you
//: level 20 will max out your number of summons

description: Call forth blazing infernos from the flame god to assist you
//: level 20 will max out your number of summons

description: You hurl a pea-sized glowing orb that when reaches its target or an obstacle produces a pressure-less blast of searing heat.

name: Muscle King Kyriakos
description: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH.

special_attacks.monster_message: The Flame God calls forth firey tornadoes!

name: Thunderbird
description: A cryptid seldom believe to exist, though it's thundering cry can't be mistaken for anything else.

special_attacks.monster_message: Lightning crackles from above, striking you and leaving you stunned!

name: Lich King
description: The king of all liches, it is even believed that he is the creator of the initiation ritual.

special_attacks.monster_message: Souls spring forth from the lich priest and heal an ally!

description: Kunai at the ready to pierce that which isn't part of the clan.

name: Soul Blade Shinobi
description: A cunning soul-blade ninja, specializing in assassinations and stealth.

special_attacks.description: The ninja throws a crystal kunai!

special_attacks.monster_message: Ninjas dance around the battlefield launching kunai at you!

name: Inaka, White Wolf of Death
description: A legendary ninja, said to have been resurrected from the dead after fighting countless wars.

special_attacks.monster_message: Ninjas dance around the battlefield launching kunai at you!

name: Thousand Edge Blade
description: A sword wielded by the legendary master of arms, said to be able to cut one-thousand times in a single swing.

special_attacks.monster_message: More blades spring to life!

name: Soul Blade Bounty Hunter
description: A legendary ronin, it is said that he keeps a sword from every hunt as a trophy.

special_attacks.monster_message: The blade hunter summons his collection!

name: Dancing Blade
description: A trophy from the bounty hunter's collection.

name: Inaka, White Wolf of Death
description: A legendary ninja, said to have been resurrected from the dead after fighting countless wars.

special_attacks.monster_message: The white wolf clouds dashes away and clouds himself in smoke!

name: Dullahan Hydra
description: An ancient wizard, once part of a mysterious cabal of powerful mages, though in their power-hungry madness they tore eachother apart.

special_attacks.monster_message: Skulls spring forth from the dullahan's armor!

name: Dullahan Head
description: A disembodied head of the dullahan hydra.

special_attacks.monster_message: The dullahan knight switches places with one of its severed heads!

name: Lich Priest
description: A member of the lich covenant, uses souls of the dead to heal it's allies.

special_attacks.monster_message: Souls spring forth from the lich priest and heal an ally!

name: Possessed Headstone
description: A gravestone with demons springing from it.

special_attacks.monster_message: The headstone attracts evil spirits!

name: Skeleton Soulmancer
description: A lowly soulmancer attracted by the possessed gravestone.

special_attacks.monster_message: The soulmancer calls from the beyond to raise skeletons!

name: Lich Soldier
description: A servant of the lich covenant, but it seems as though this is simply a soldier fallen in battle.

special_attacks.monster_message: The lich guard covers the area in darkness!

name: Lich Knight
description: A colossal lich, once a decorated knight.

special_attacks.monster_message: The lichknight calls forth soul-stolen soldiers!

name: Flame God
description: The blazing inferno brought by the flame god is only an inkling of his destructive will.

special_attacks.monster_message: The Flame God calls forth firey tornadoes!

name: Flame God's Grasp
description: A fragment of the Flame God's presence, merely a faint image of his hand brings great destruction upon the area.

special_attacks.monster_message: The Flame God sets his wrath upon you!

name: Flame-nado
description: A twisting inferno created by the flame god.

special_attacks.monster_message: The Flame God sets his wrath upon you!

name: Crystalline Blood Clot
description: A large growth of devil blood forming around a crystal.

name: Lamia
description: Once a beatiful queen, now a cursed demon.

special_attacks.monster_message: Grigori opens his maw and breathes a cone of fire!

name: Dracolich
description: Only the death of this great dragon will staunch the flood of destruction, though heed the zealot's lesson well. When the weak court death, they find it.

special_attacks.monster_message: Grigori opens his maw and breathes a cone of fire!

name: Grigori, Harbinger of Destruction
description: Only the death of this great dragon will staunch the flood of destruction, though heed the zealot's lesson well. When the weak court death, they find it.

special_attacks.monster_message: Grigori opens his maw and breathes a cone of fire!

name: Ghidra, King of Monsters
description: King Geedorah, his own biggest fan, and got a fan base as big as Japan. All hail the king and give him three cheers, fam.

special_attacks.monster_message: Ghidora has covered the surrounding area in electricity!

name: Bahamut, the Dragon King
description: Conqueror of the skies, Bahamut has known many names; the Dragon King, the Hallowed Father, the First Sire.

special_attacks.monster_message: Bahamut casts Megaflare!

name: White Wolf
description: A spirit-wolf, the eternal soul-linked companion of Inaka.

name: Chimera
description: A fearsome beast bearing the heads of both a lion and a goat while its tail takes the form of a giant snake. The chimeras features so distinguish it from the natural world that it is believed by most to be born not of Gods power but of the sorcerers arts..

name: Dragon Monk Doomsayer
description: An exiled member of the dragon monks due to his prophetic visions, though his predictions ended up coming true. Uses forbidden dragon summoning techniques

special_attacks.monster_message: The dragon monk doomsayer calls forth a dragon!

name: Dragon Monk Avatar
description: This is an appointed member of the dragon-cult that acts as the emmissary between dragons and humans. As their leader, he is extremely powerful.

special_attacks.monster_message: The dragon monk avatar calls disciples to his aid!

name: Dragon Monk Disciple
description: A member of a draconic deathcult, they have forbidden the use of weapons in combat, representing the raw nature of a dragon's destructive presence. Even this lowly initiate is a formiddable foe

special_attacks.monster_message: The dragon monk hits you with a stunning blow!

name: Saurian
description: A large reptilian creature equipped with a makeshift spear mainly used for hunting fish.

name: Vilewing Runewhelp
description: A magical flying construct made from enchanted runes, powered by a special crystal.

name: Voidwing Runewhelp
description: A magical flying construct made from enchanted runes, powered by a special crystal.

name: Bloodwing Runewhelp
description: A magical flying construct made from enchanted runes, powered by a special crystal.

name: Shockwing Runewhelp
description: A magical flying construct made from enchanted runes, powered by a special crystal.

name: Bolide Runeshark
description: A magical runic creature somehow able to shift in and out of objects.

name: Abyss Snake
description: A creature made from living shadows, it's bite causes fear.

name: Toad Shaman
description: A gigantic toad practiced in the ways of casting magic.

name: Leech Warlock
description: A large flying leech, it controls 2 mindless worm drones and the leech itself is a drone serving a greater worm-god

special_attacks.monster_message: The leech absorbs life energy from the area!

name: Penguin Sorcerer
description: A large penguin, capable of casting frost magic

special_attacks.monster_message: Cold fog surrounds the area!

name: Worm wizard
description: A highly intelligent species of telepathic worm. Slimy and aggressive

special_attacks.monster_message: Worms emerge from the ground!

name: Shadow Seer
description: Your eyes meet a menacing gaze hidden behind writhing magical shadows, spreading darkness wherever it looks.

special_attacks.monster_message: Shadows cloud your mind

name: Shark Dash
description: gunbreaker dash spell.

name: Wolf Dash
description: gunbreaker dash spell.

name: Slug Druid
description: A highly intelligent species of spellcasting-slug, and a guardian of nature.

special_attacks.monster_message: A demonic effigy appears!
